Summary: UFO hovering over mountains over multiple nights.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Boulevard
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsThe sighting of a bright light hovering over a mountain top directly northeast of the Boulevard church was seen on multiple nights around 9pm - midnight. When the bright light is hovering a picture is taken and the photo shows an object that looks nothing like a plane or a helicopter. The object is shaped somewhat like a cone with what appears to be windows in the middle. When the flash is used on the camera the UFO quickly drops from sight only to reappear moments later. The object has been seen in the same location for at least 2 weeks.
